name: documentary
content:

B1 a film or television or radio programme that gives facts and information about a subject: The documentary took a fresh look at the life of Darwin. They showed a documentary on animal communication.
More examplesFewer examplesWe're compiling some facts and figures for a documentary on the subject.The documentary was made on location in the Gobi desert.The documentary presented us with a balanced view of the issue.The documentary went through all the graphic details of the operation in unsparing detail.The documentary was a misrepresentation of the truth and bore little resemblance to actual events.
